1.title: De andere vrouw
1.plot: Engineer Mark Nuyens dies from a fall on site. Now housewife Karen Van Dijck, the mother of his rascally adolescent son Maarten, getting in trouble during dad's frequent long professional absences, discovers he was married to Nina Overstijns, in another province. Only his brother Ruben was in the know. Will the rival women go public or remain discrete?

2.title: De begrafenis
2.plot: The widow bitch blindly against each-other and Mark's poor brother-confidant Ruben about everything, notably the impending funeral. Their respective families share n considerations concerning life with and after Mark. Son Maarten resents being told only his pa was married to another woman, and bites at his ma she must have failed to keep him, not the kids.

3.title: Een nieuw begin
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: De graffiti
4.plot: Maarten's teacher Johan Van Neygem tells mate Ruben his mother stupidly ignored his advices to arrange therapy for the angrily grieving knave. At a reunion, Ruben revives his affair with Sandrine, but she wants a steady relationship. Obsessed with his dad's other life, Maarten follows Nina, breaks in and sprays 'slut' on the walls. After 'punishing' Ruben's forgetfulness with domestic chores, Karen complains when her mother does it all properly. Then she maximizes embarrassment for Maarten, making him repaint Nina's wall at his own expense, which gets them talking.

5.title: Een avondje uit
5.plot: Maarten adopts dad's hobby, photography, despite ma's lame objection the chemicals are 'dangerous'. His teacher enjoys a dance evening with her, but Ruben's advice to take the initiative backfires. Taunted by his ex's cocky boyfriend in class, Maarten pierces his hand. Now ma accepts to see a therapist, but rudely rejects her analysis Maarten's way of mourning should be respected, yet gives in later. Drunk as a skunk, Nina gets picked up by a fake widower who gets physical until she sprays in his eyes, then files a complaint as if raped and gets Ruben to put her up in...

6.title: Een beetje seks
6.plot: Maarten seeks to conjure dad by reproducing some of his pictures with himself in dad's spot an flying his kite until dad's ghost comes coach him a moment. Ruben is startled that Nina, jealous of a colleague's baby, proposes him to make her pregnant without any role after the child's birth; Karen meanly forces Maarten to 'volunteer' gardening at granddad's so she can seduce his teacher. But granddad's wining makes angry Maarten return home and see them in bed.

7.title: Stap voor stap
7.plot: Maarten is furious to find his teacher Johan now sleeps with is ma, so he pulls a public stunt with his hairpiece. She cowardly puts the affair on hold for a day. Ruben has accepted to father Nina's baby without strings, but she refuses any romance, even a gift, while he falls in love. Matthias offers him a permanent travel agency partnership. New shoes hurt his feet and expose his affair to Karen, whose boss's ship is in trouble. A school assignment reconciles Maarten and his Goth class neighbor, realizing Photigraphy is a common hobby.

8.title: Het gevecht
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Afscheid van een vriend
9.plot: Ruben is dating until his first tour guide duty in Cambodia. Maarten's shyness to bring her to his old mates gang's costumed party turns off Goth girl Romy, whom Johan considers a good match. His ma starts as an orderly, thereto chucking in her shop clerk job without notice, but after a patience dies from cardiac arrest while she stands by uselessly dis-heartedly decides to quit, and somehow blames Johan either way. Nina was happy to overcome solitude by taking in 'for now' a colleague with marital problems. Her artificial insemination is canceled- because she's ...

10.title: Overspel en jaloezie
10.plot: After a bad exam, Maarten falls for the temptation to steal exam questions, but ends up getting caught, likely to have to repeat his year. Ruben has accepted a desk job at the travel agency to stay with his unborn baby, yet ingrate Nina plays vicious jealous tricks on his ex Stephanie. Johan doesn't realize Karen is cheating on him with Nick, a single father she met while camping outdoors the school brat Hanah wants to get into like her friends. Neither woman accepts to dine together with Ruben and Johan.

11.title: Zon, zee en toenadering
11.plot: Ruben and Johan finally convinced their vindictively reluctant girls to have a joined long beach camping weekend, with brat Hannah. Maarten wasn't supposed to come, given his exams cheating disaster, but he says he'll just wait for his inheritance at 21 and sleeps in a tent anyway with Romy, by a neighbor's pool, where they accidentally see Johann skinny-dip at his ma's instigation. The cops catch the kids but let them off with a warning. Nina refuses to formally respond to Ruben's proposal, as if it were just out of pity and to keep the baby. The rivals come to terms.

12.title: Wat ik wil
12.plot: Maarten is happy, although repeating his school year with extra domestic chores, due to a photography prize and his Goth girl Romy, who entered the picture for him. Pregnant Nina is mean to Ruben, who only wants to be a real dad. Her own, still ignorant pa Bert announces his wedding plans, which implies divorcing her ma. Romy present Maarten to her hunky cousin, last year photography student Stijn, to suggest that major. Johan and Karen, who resumed nursing, focus on her sister Nathalie and her partner Koen's Bolivian development project, which gets all gift for her ...

13.title: Het einde
13.plot: Karen selfishly insist to ruin Maarten's life further by dragging him to her brother-in-law Koen's Bolivian development project (where she'll be of of no real use) for a whole year, although her parents offer to take him in. Only after learning Ruben convinced him to wait till age 18 and girl-friend Romy being dumped, she sees reason. Nina's pa Bert grudgingly hands her the address of her ma, who left them 20 years ago and refuses any contact. Bert convinces Ruben and Nina to make up and raise the baby together.

imdb.plot outline: Only a while after the death of Mark Nuyens, his doting son adolescent son Maarten, his legally unwed ma, housewife Karen, and others learn that Mark lead a double bigamy-like life. Only Mark's brother Ruben knew he secretly married, in another province, advertising-career-bachelorette Nina. The inheritance is only one of many complications for the bereaved and those in their own lives.
imdb.title: Dubbelleven
plot: Only a while after the death of Mark Nuyens, his doting son adolescent son Maarten, his legally unwed ma, housewife Karen, and others learn that Mark lead a double bigamy-like life. Only Mark's brother Ruben knew he secretly married, in another province, advertising-career-bachelorette Nina. The inheritance is only one of many complications for the bereaved and those in their own lives.::KGF Vissers
